title: 【重要通知 Important Notice】 東華e學苑服務公告，敬請學生登入新版e學苑 Students must log in to the new version of Dong Hwa e-Learning
author: 王立凡
content:
分類： 其他公告
來源： 教學卓越中心 - 王立凡 - lfwang@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話8906422
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 【重要通知 Important Notice】 東華e學苑服務公告，敬請學生登入新版e學苑 Students must log in to the new version of Dong Hwa e-Learning
日期： Thu, 11 Apr 2024 16:26:10 +0800

敬愛的師生您好：

本校舊版東華e學苑因受地震影響導致伺服器硬體故障而暫停服務。
目前已完成資料救援，並重新開放服務。
因資料受損且資料量龐大，故花費較多時間進行復原，造成各位師生諸多不便，敬請見諒。

請各位師長把握時間將平台上的資料備份下載，以方便匯入新版e學苑。
(操作方法請參考：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ky6persapOY&list=PLybC-1pHRENmL_uuO8iNHHq9ow6XZyuB4&index=7)

新版e學苑亦持續提供服務，學生需要登入後才能收到課程資料。
如學生名單有出入，大部分是因為學生尚未登入新版e學苑的關係，學生登入後會自動進入課程。
正確選課名單請以教務處系統為主：教務資訊系統 - 國立東華大學教務處 (ndhu.edu.tw)。
教師操作設定可參考下列影片：https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLybC-1pHRENmL_uuO8iNHHq9ow6XZyuB4

請各位同學務必登入新版東華e學苑才能收到最新課程資訊，大家可以從下列網址進入：https://elearn4.ndhu.edu.tw
帳號認證方式與舊版e學苑不同，請使用GMS的帳號及密碼作登入，登入後才會啟動帳號收到課程資訊。
新版網站可自適應不同的行動載具，提供相對應的呈現方式。
登入教學影片：https://youtu.be/VVJPkaJzoso?si=1ZSTO1VtdtPghuRl

謝謝各位師生的支持及耐心等待。

敬祝平安、順利
教學卓越中心
王立凡助理
038906422

----

Dear faculty and students,
Due to hardware failure caused by the recent earthquake, the previous version of Dong Hwa's e-Learning platform has been temporarily suspended.
We have now completed data recovery and have reopened the service.
However, due to the extensive data damage and volume, the recovery process has taken longer than anticipated, causing inconvenience to all of you. We sincerely apologize for this.

We kindly request all faculty members to take this opportunity to download and backup data from the platform to facilitate its import into the new e-Learning version.
(For instructions, please refer to: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ky6persapOY&list=PLybC-1pHRENmL_uuO8iNHHq9ow6XZyuB4&index=7)

The new e-Learning version continues providing services, but students must log in to receive course materials.
Any discrepancies in the student roster are primarily due to students not yet logging into the new e-Learning version; they will automatically enter the course upon login.
Please refer to the Academic Affairs Office system: Academic Information System - National Dong Hwa University Academic Affairs Office (ndhu.edu.tw) for accurate course registration information.
For teacher operations and settings guidance, please refer to the following videos: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLybC-1pHRENmL_uuO8iNHHq9ow6XZyuB4 .

For students, you must log in to the new version of Dong Hwa e-Learning to receive the latest course information.
You can access it via the following link: https://elearn4.ndhu.edu.tw . Please note that the account authentication method differs from the old version.
You must use your GMS account and password to log in, and only after logging in will your account be activated to receive course information.

The new version of the website is responsive and adaptable to various mobile devices, providing corresponding presentation formats.

For guidance on login procedures, please watch the instructional video: https://youtu.be/VVJPkaJzoso?si=1ZSTO1VtdtPghuRl .

Thank you for your support and patience.

Best regards,
Center for Teaching Excellence
Assistant Mr. Wang
